runs.comm: back of a length outside off, takes the toe of the bat towards cover
gets this through the in field, comes onto the front foot and drives between cover and mid-off
big appeal for lbw, but that looked high and leg-side...good ball, though, nipped back off a length and Warner just fell across the shot
flicked from off stump into midwicket
full delivery, Warner lofts it over the off side but without quite his full power

gone! Taken at third man! Curious dismissal, but not entirely dissimilar to a couple of the Test dismissals when he was out pulling. Was a shorter delivery, Warner wanted to play into the leg side and got into a bit of a tangle, the ball took the thick leading edge and carried easily to Finn as he took a few paces in
short of a length outside off, Watson latches on with a thumping front-foot pull through straight midwicket
good comeback from Finn, fuller outside off and nips away off the seam to beat Watson as he plays away from his body
a bouncer, over off stump, close to a wide but Finn gets away with it
lovely stroke, effortless as he drives a full delivery wide of mid-off...a bit floaty from Finn

dragged on! Oh Watto! Would you believe it. A good length ball from Finn which he defended down by his feet. It them bobbles back towards the stumps, Watson tries to kick it away but misses and can only watch as the ball dislodged a bail
clipped through square leg
defended to the off side
width outside off and it's hammered through square cover as Maxwell frees his arms

plenty going on here! A good ball from Willey, short of a length, which nips back at Maxwell who fends it towards slip. Smith races up for a single but Maxwell isn't moving and Smith has to sprint back. The throw is wild in any event
swivels on a pull which goes backward of square...a very well-controlled stroke, not brute force
clipped off the pads to deep square
full and straight, drilled down the ground with plenty of bottom hand...didn't try to over-hit, just slotted it back past the bowler
drags the length back, 84mph, on middle and off, defended

goes for a booming drive to a full delivery, gets an inside edge into the pads...starts off for a run, would have been tight with a direct hit, then he gets an overthrow as Stokes pings his shy to deep square
short on off stump, Smith gets inside the line and pulls behind square...had some much time
super fielding by Stokes, driven on the up into backward point and he flings himself low to his left to cut off a boundary...almost made it a blinding catch, to
short of a length, Maxwell goes for a pull but just gets taken on the pad
left arm over, back of a length at off stump, driven to cover
fuller outside off, 81mph, Smith stays on the back foot and drives square to point
just over mid-on! Smith drives a full delivery and manages to evade Willey who had come in a few paces. Was a slower ball out of the back of the hand
gets away with a short ball as Smith flays it to cover who parries it away for a single
a clean piece of work this time from Roy at cover as Smith drives with his bottom hand coming off the bat
can't get through the off side, drives a back-of-a-length delivery to cover...good start from Topley
fantastic stroke, a glorious straight six by Smith as he lofts a full delivery towards the short boundary
whips this from well outside off to deep square
gives himself room to the leg side and then gets beaten by a very full delivery which he tries to drive
short ball at the body, pulled straight to midwicket...seemed to hurry on a little
nips back off a length and takes the thigh pad behind square on the off side
drives at a full delivery and bottom edges into his boot
that's a wild mow across the line, gets an inside edge past the stumps to fine leg
back of a length outside off, driven to deep cover
close with a direct hit! A slower ball outside off, dropped towards point. Stokes quickly and has an under-arm flick. Very tight, but he missed the stums
gets this past deep cover, could Hales have done better? Driven square through point. Yes, Hales made a bit of a mess of that
short of a length at middle and leg, worked to midwicket
that's a sweet pull, Maxwell is up and running, Topley drops it short and it gets dispatched in front of square
full outside off, driven firmly to cover who makes a good save
slow, loopy outside off, Smith drives down to long off
Yorkshire to Yorkshire, straighter delivery which is eased down the ground
full at the stumps, pushed to long-off...fifty stand in 35 balls
waits for this outside off and cuts to deep cover
a shorter delivery which slides into Smith who sends it through midwicket with a straight bat
short of a length at off stump, shovelled round the corner to short fine leg
gets across onto off stump and tucks through midwicket
aims to flick a back-of-a-length delivery and it takes the thigh pad behind square
tucked off the hip...ah, again no bat involved
excellent placement as he pulls a short ball through square leg...bisects the two men in the deep
not far off another catch to third man as Smith flashes hard at width outside off, but it goes one bounce to Rashid
put down in the crowd as Smith uses his feet then launches Rashid over long-on...wasn't quite to the pitch, but just went through with the stroke
straight down the ground again, not quite the power this time, and long-off comes around
on leg stump, goes for the sweep, gets it very fine and Finn is just able to catch up with it
flicks a straight delivery into the leg side
dragged down short outside off, Smith fetches it and pulls through midwicket wide of long-on
driven off the back foot to long-off
short again, pulled behind square...good piece of fielding and a strong throw from Finn means Smith has to get the dive out . He's fully airborne, brilliant effort, and he gets home
comes down the pitch outside leg stump and has a wild swing at a length delivery
another short one, pulled through midwicket but not out of the middle
superb batting, a slower ball outside off, Smith waits a fraction longer for it then drives square through the off side to beat deep point
short into the body, 88mph, takes Smith's body down by his feet...Maxwell calls him through, Stokes shows his football skills by kicking into the stumps
deft batting this time, short outside off and Maxwell late cuts to third man
short ball is costly, a freebie to Maxwell as he rocks back and pulls it high into the stands over deep square leg
gets this fuller, on leg stump, calmly pushed down the ground...mature batting
full outside off, driven to cover
he's drilled that straight down the ground, more swift footwork and he took it from outside off straight of long-on...a very good fifty from 30 balls
driven to deep cover
pushed gently through midwicket and the soft placement gives them the chance to come back for a second
length outside off, carved through the covers wide of the sweeper
a rather ungainly heave through the leg side but it's quite effective, almost reaches the boundary but Billings produces an outstanding piece of work as he slides around the boundary
that's huge! That made the perfect 'crack' off the bat as Smith swung a length delivery into the pavilion at deep square-leg. Blimey, that was big
short of a length, pulled along the ground to deep square
blocked from off stump into the covers...more sensible batting
short outside off, clubbed wide of Morgan at cover and it's another brace

watch a catch! He's struck first ball. But it's all down to Ben Stokes. It was a short ball, Maxwell fluffed his pull but it was still travelling wide of long on before Stokes ran around, diving to his right and pulled off a blinder
nudged into the leg side
on off stump, defended
gets across the crease to a slightly shorter ball, takes the pad to the leg side
worked down the ground to long-on
flicked off the stumps out to deep midwicket...the over England needed
back of a length outside off, pushed square to point
dropped short, too much of that from England's quicks today, and Smith slots it away over midwicket with a front-foot pull
gets this fuller, slugged down the ground to long-on
full at off stump, 88mph, pushed to cover
short of a length, angled into the hip, flicked away between deep square and long leg
full at off stump, driven sweetly off the front foot but straight to mid-off
full outside off, Smith loses his shape and mistimes back to the bowler
length outside off, driven almost straight to deep cover but they still manage a second...ah, Billings slipped a little
a yorker which is squeezed out square through the off side
keeps it full at the stumps, low full toss this time, driven to deep cover
fired in at leg stump, flicked through midwicket and more good running brings another couple
slower ball, dragged down short, Smith swings it to midwicket...good effort from Topley
full and straight, Marsh swings to the leg side and gets an inside edge to short fine leg
brilliant invention from Smith, he moves across his crease and then pulls a short delivery from well outside off behind square on the leg side
that's even better from Smith, this time he stays on leg stump and drives it over deep cover into the stands...two wonderful pieces of batting
a slower bouncer, Smith swings through his shot and gets beaten
back of a length, sliced in the air over cover to the sweeper
swung from outside off to deep midwicket
oh dear, that's a horrid misfield...Marsh drives firmly to long-off and Moeen lets it through his legs. His first mistake of the day
clubbed to long-on
a slightly more ungainly pull this time down to long-on
first wicket for Topley! A well disguised slower ball. Back of the hand, excellent control, Marsh is far too early on his stroke and bottom edges into his stumps
round the wicket, full at off stump, calmly pushed to long-on
yorker to finish with, down to long-off
round the wicket, back of a length, connects well with a swing through midwicket but straight to the man in the deep
neatly played, gets inside the line and tucks it off his pads to long leg

he's gone! Ten short of a hundred. Smith got too far underneath this as he aimed to clear deep midwicket. The ball went high, came off the bottom of the bat and his hand came off the handle...Billings takes the vital catch
places it between two men! Another short ball, Stoinis pulls strongly, in the air for most of the way and neither deep square or midwicket can quite get around
fuller this time, at the stumps, an aborted appeal for lbw...was going down
back over the wicket, full and straight, driven to long-off

mix-up! A length ball is swung to long-off, Wade turned and, head down, wanted the second for Stoinis didn't fancy it and left his team-mate stranded. The throw was decent and Stokes whipped off the bails
well bowled! A yorker outside off, swing and a miss from Stoinis as he lifts his head on the shot
oh dear, that's not good, a slower ball down the leg side...extra run, extra ball
full and straight, driven straight to long-off, they won't get two here
falls first ball! Has a mighty swing at a length delivery, goes up the air towards short third man...Rashid calmly takes a few steps backwards and shallows the catch

another run out! England brilliant in this last over. Full at leg stump, drilled down to long on. They had to gamble on the second run but the return was quick and flat, Stokes was by the stumps and completes his second run out of the over
heaved into the leg side, it's not enough
